name: Burger Money: Cooking Game
description:
Welcome to you own burger restaurant! Cook, manage and buy ingredients to make tastier burgers and bring more customers!

Collect all the money from the counter and buy ingredient for the restaurant!

Features:

- High quality graphics!
- Many levels to unlock!
- Simple and intuitive chef cooking gameplay!
- A complete cooking game and a whole restaurant for you!
- Many surprises are waiting for you!

Open the doors to this fast food restaurant and become the manager of your own business! Become the best fast food chef!

Play now!
